len.name: Len
len.description: What is a VTuber doing in this game?

MusicNote.name: Music Note
MusicNote.description: At start of turn, <c=status>eat</c> {0} bananas for free. <c=hurt>Banana Stash passive is disabled</c>.

EatBanana.name: Eat Banana
EatBanana.description: Len <c=status>eats</c> a banana, making the enemy so hungry they lose {{Damamge}} hull.{{MaidDress}}

description.gain: Add {0} bananas to your Banana Stash.
description.lose: Remove {0} bananas from your Banana Stash.
description.loseAll: Remove all bananas from your Banana Stash.

SmashBanana.name: Smash Banana
SmashBanana.description: Get rid of {0} bananas. Doesn't trigger Banana Stash.

ThrowBanana.name: Throw Banana
ThrowBanana.description: Len <c=card>throws</c> a banana so fast and strongly it deals {{Damage}} piercing damage to the enemy.{{MaidDress}}

BananaStash.name: Banana Stash
BananaStash.description:
Each turn, Len <c=status>eats</c> a banana.
<c=hurt>If there are no bananas, there will be no effect</c>.

Brioche.name: Brioche
Brioche.description: On pickup, Banana damage is increased by 1.

MaidDress.name: Maid Dress
MaidDress.description: <c=healing>#Blessed.</c> Bananas now give you 2 <c=status>SHIELD</c> before <c=status>eating</c> or <c=card>throwing</c> them.

TwinPower.name: Twin Power
TwinPower.description:
<c=405a7f>Rin is hiding in the other ship.</c>
Gain 1 extra <c=energy>ENERGY</c> every turn. <c=hurt>On even turns, enemy ship gains 2</c> <c=status>overdrive</c>.

Breaktime.name: Breaktime
Breaktime.description: <c=card>Throw</c> {{Amount}} bananas for the price of one.

HolyLanceExplosion.name: Holy Lance Explosion
HolyLanceExplosion.description: Gain 1 <c=status>droneshift</c>. <c=hurt>Smash</c> a banana to launch a <c=midrow>sword</c>.

Paradichlorobenzene.name: Paradichlorobenzene
Paradichlorobenzene.description: If you have bananas, the enemy loses all <c=status>shield</c>. <c=healing>Gain</c> a banana.

ToluthinAntenna.name: Toluthin Antenna
ToluthinAntenna.description: Add 1 of {0} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=hacker>Max</c> & <c=peri>Peri</c> cards to your hand.
